text: I was grateful to be invited as a guest for dinner. Exudes old school charm with warmth and family atmosphere. Service is top shelf. Food is a mix of local favorites and Western fare. The grounds are immaculate. And the vibe transforms you to another place and another time.

Pretty decent place. Food at the Chinese restaurant is fairly good. Service is excellent. But the place has a run down feel. It could be just me being exposed to some of the better Japanese resorts. Fairly decent experience.

Secluded golf course with a members only bistro/diner that makes you feel like you're not in Singapore. The local favourites like satay, char kway teow and carrot cake are must-tries. Drinks are 50% off during Happy Hour. The waffle with ice cream was also super indulgent and delicious!
One of the top country clubs in Singapore. Love the golf course and views plus impeccable service from staff.
Very nice. Too bad only played 10 holes. Will be back to complete a full 18, weather permitting.
